body: This series got progressively worse for me. The concept of multiple male protagonists doesn't work for me. I constantly feel like being NTRed on every Captain-President scene since I only consider Souta (the first guy/MC in anime version) to be the protagonist.
我就是想看男主跟其他人打砲，作者怎麼有辦法每次在劇情最高潮 打消我的興致(´・ω・`)

@zombieadd in chapter 37 captain and president have sex in a public garden. Chapter ends with Aoi’s female friends running after souta because they know he washed disguised.
Chapter 38 aoi and souta flee to a cospla cafe and end up having sex with aoi wearing a streetfighter chinese dress.
***SPOILER***
In chapter 41  souta and aoi wake up from the sex we see in chapter 40 and souta goes home. Then aoi’s sister get released and, aroused and frustrated she goes into her room to masturbate while fantasizing about souta’s massage in chapter 39. Chapter end with souta’s friend (the short one) goes at a party with his girlfriend.
In chapter 42, everyone at the party is sleeping and end up having sex quietly in a futon but get caught by captain sasakura, who give them a sex toy and then leaves them to their business.
***SPOILER END***
